segments.en: Numbered Discourses 1
9. Negligence

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, pamādo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as negligence.
Negligence is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, appamādo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as diligence.
Diligence is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, kosajjaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as laziness.
Laziness is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, vīriyārambho.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as arousing energy.
Arousing energy is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, mahicchatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as having many wishes.
Having many wishes is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, appicchatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as having few wishes.
Having few wishes is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, asantuṭṭhitā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as lack of contentment.
Lack of contentment is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, santuṭṭhitā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as contentment.
Contentment is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ayonisomanasikāro.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as improper attention.
Improper attention is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso—manasikāro.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as proper attention.
Proper attention is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, asampajaññaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as lack of situational awareness.
Lack of situational awareness is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, sampajaññaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as situational awareness.
Situational awareness is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, pāpamittatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as bad friends.
Bad friends are very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, kalyāṇamittatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as good friends.
Good friends are very beneficial.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, anuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ananuyogo kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very harmful as pursuing bad habits and not good habits.

segments.pli: Anuyogo, bhikkhave, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ananuyogo kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: Pursuing bad habits and not good habits is very harmful.”

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yo evaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, anuyogo kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ananuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that is so very beneficial as pursuing good habits and not bad habits.

segments.pli: Anuyogo, bhikkhave, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, ananuyogo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: Pursuing good habits and not bad habits is very beneficial.”
